snippet.title: COMPLETELY STRETCHY AND UNCOMFORTABLY STICKY (GAMEPLAY TRAILER)
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Grombi Isles! Completely Stretchy and Uncomfortably Sticky is coming to Steam soon, wishlist now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1587570/Completely_Stretchy/

Completely Stretchy and Uncomfortably Sticky is a first-person exploration platformer set in the strange and wonderful Grombi Isles. After a rough day at the electro factory, you find yourself transformed - with a blue, stretchy, and sticky body!  To make matters worse, the electros have escaped containment! Harness your newfound stretchiness to climb, swing and stick your way through this bizarre world. Track down the hidden electros to restore power and unravel the mystery of why you are so stretchy (and uncomfortably sticky).
